titles.title: A bill to extend the temporary reduction of duty on certain liquid-filled glass bulbs.
A bill to extend the temporary reduction of duty on certain liquid-filled glass bulbs.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend the temporary suspension of duty on liquid-filled glass bulbs designed for sprinkler systems and other release devices.
